__e: Don't you know it's a sin to get beat by your son?
You are everything that I am, plus one more sin:
It'd be a sin not to make the end come as soon as possible.
I'm in mortal sin because of you!
Girl, pride is a deadly sin and you is too young to die.
For you, what happened isn't a mortal sin.
If I hurt you, that isn't a sin but if I kill myself, it is?
I have sinned more greatly and fallen lower than you all.
It's a terrible sin and you're two years younger than me.
I have not sinned against you even though you have hunted me and sought to take my life.
You have sinned against me against your family against God.
Don't you understand that every minute I stay with you is a sin against him?
To my sons, I have bequeathed the evil that is in my blood.
They say it's not a sin if you don't take pleasure in it.
This is the sin I tried to keep you from learning.
And the wages of sin is death!
If that sin is on your soul, my son, you must make your peace with God.
And as for standard, some wise man once said that sin is that which is unnecessary.
